data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 30302, Version Hash: db622561b65eae5128bc8eab9db7679a4527c3fb
data.actual_result: The delete button is visible to the user and it does not function properly
data.expected_result: The delete button in the user settings panel should not be shown to the user with an unclaimed account
data.short_description: Users of unclaimed accounts are presented with a button to delete their account that does nothing
data.steps_to_repro: - Access a server invite link in a browser window that is not logged into Discord - Create an account with a username and continue - Skip the popup menu that prompts for an email and password by clicking outside of it - Go to user settings and press the delete account button and confirm the action
